actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide that daylight savings time commence each year on the first Sunday in March rather than the last Sunday in April.

summary.text: Amends the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to extend daylight saving time from the first Sunday of March rather than the last Sunday of April.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide that daylight savings time commence each year on the first Sunday in March rather than the last Sunday in April.
